articles.title: Design System In 90 Days

articles.description: Explore helpful PDF worksheets and tools to kickstart and promote the adoption of your design system, inspired by the "How To Measure UX and Design Impact" course—showing the real business value of great UX work.

articles.title: A Reader’s Question on Nested Lists
articles.author: CSS-Tricks
articles.description: Delve into techniques for creating complex, nested numbering systems with CSS list counters, answering a common question from CSS-Tricks readers about advanced list styling.

articles.title: Creating Blob Shapes using clip-path: shape()
articles.author: Frontend Masters
articles.description: Discover blobs—playful, gooey shapes that can be filled with backgrounds and animated for dynamic, eye-catching designs.

description: Explore the intersection of design systems and business value by utilizing PDF worksheets that enhance UX impact. Learn to master complex list styling with CSS counters for nested numbering systems, and dive into the world of blobs—dynamic shapes that breathe life into user interfaces with their playful animations and backgrounds.
joke: Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because they didn't know how to 'null' their feelings.
challenge: Create an interactive blob generator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users should be able to adjust the shape, size, and color of the blobs dynamically. Add a feature to animate the blobs, allowing them to morph and move across the screen, creating a playful and engaging visual experience.
